helpDescription: Need assistance? Check our FAQs or contact us below.
faqProfilePicture: How do I change my profile picture?
faqProfilePictureAnswer: Go to your Profile page and click the upload button to select a new image.
faqDarkMode: How do I enable dark mode?
faqDarkModeAnswer: Go to Settings and toggle the Dark Mode switch.
faqForgotPassword: I forgot my password. What should I do?
faqForgotPasswordAnswer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.

eventAnnouncement: Dear students and staff, there will be an event...
thankYouMessage: Dear user, thank you for using our service.
